about_the_game:
Master the art of deflection, execute deadly moves, and conquer challenging bosses in a Sekiro-inspired soulslike game. Choose contracts, defeat mobs for rewards, and evolve your character with an immersive skill tree



Epic Boss Fights
Prepare for breathtaking showdowns against a series of awe-inspiring bosses. Each arena presents a unique challenge, and only the most skilled players will emerge victorious. Can you conquer them all and unlock new arenas in your quest to become the ultimate warrior?



Parry and Execution Based Combat
In Colessium Enigma, timing is everything. Master the art of parrying, execute your enemies with precision, and revel in the satisfaction of a perfectly timed counter attack. Our combat system captures the essence of Sekiro, delivering a heart-pounding experience that demands skill and finesse.

Special Attacks
Unleash the fury of your inner warrior with a variety of special attacks. Whether you're dishing out ice attacks to damage enemies in front of you or freezing every foe in your vicinity, these unique abilities add an exciting layer of strategy to your battles. Harness the power of these moves to gain the upper hand in your quest to conquer the arenas.

Different Character Builds
Customize your playstyle with a diverse range of character builds. Tailor your character to suit your preferred combat approach, whether you favor agile finesse, brute force, or something in between. Experiment with different loadouts and create the ultimate warrior to take on the toughest challenges.



Contracts
If you seek to enhance your character's stats before facing the bosses, take on contracts that challenge you to defeat waves of formidable mobs in the arenas. Be rewarded with random items and valuable experience as you hone your skills and prepare for your ultimate showdown.
